name: Charizard

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energies attached to Charizard. Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Attach any Fire Energies you find to Charizard and discard the rest.

flavor: These menacing beasts will blast through whole cities. Their hot breath is terrifying but their claws aren't much more welcoming.
